components.label: Colon
components.description: Configure the default value of colon for Form.Item. Indicates whether the colon after the label is displayed (only effective when prop layout is horizontal)

components.label: Label span
components.description: Raster number of cells to occupy, 0 corresponds to display: none

components.label: Component span
components.description: Raster number of cells to occupy, 0 corresponds to display: none

components.label: Exclude '_formFields' in the payload?
components.description: Whether or not _formFields should be included in the payload. By default it is included.

components.label: Additional fields for fetch
components.description: A list of fields you want to fetch

components.label: Persisted properties
components.description: A list of form properties you want persisted

components.label: Unique Form Id
components.description: This is very important since some form are rendered using the markup, in which case they wouldn't have the path or id that could be used as a unique id of the form

components.label: Initial Values

exposedVariables.name: data
exposedVariables.description: The form data

exposedVariables.name: parentFormValues
exposedVariables.description: Parent form values. The values of the form rendering the dialog.

exposedVariables.name: globalState
exposedVariables.description: The global state of the application

exposedVariables.name: query
exposedVariables.description: Query parameters from the address bar

components.description: Enter values that you would like passed to the server as payload. Note that you can also use Mustache expression as in {{parent.id}}. Also you can use dot notation such as query.name

components.label: Prepared Values

exposedVariables.name: data
exposedVariables.description: The form data

exposedVariables.name: moment
exposedVariables.description: The moment.js object

exposedVariables.name: parentFormValues
exposedVariables.description: Parent form values. The values of the form rendering the dialog.

exposedVariables.name: globalState
exposedVariables.description: The global state of the application

exposedVariables.name: initialValues
exposedVariables.description: Initial values

components.description: Write a code that allows you to return an object whose values will be merged with the form state before submit. Check the variables tab for exposed variables

components.label: On Initialized

exposedVariables.name: contexts
exposedVariables.description: Contexts data

exposedVariables.name: formContext
exposedVariables.description: Contexts data of current form

exposedVariables.name: moment
exposedVariables.description: The moment.js object

exposedVariables.name: parentFormValues
exposedVariables.description: Parent form values. The values of the form rendering the dialog.

exposedVariables.name: globalState
exposedVariables.description: The global state of the application

exposedVariables.name: initialValues
exposedVariables.description: Initial values

exposedVariables.name: http
exposedVariables.description: axios instance used to make http requests

exposedVariables.name: message
exposedVariables.description: This is the Ant API for displaying toast messages. See: https://ant.design/components/message/#header

exposedVariables.name: form
exposedVariables.description: The form instance

exposedVariables.name: setGlobalState
exposedVariables.description: Setting the global state of the application

components.description: This action will be executed the first time the form loads. Just before any API call has been made. At this stage, the form has no data except for initialValues if passed

availableConstants._code:
/*
    moment // The moment.js object
    parentFormValues // Parent form values. The values of the form rendering the dialog.
    globalState // The global state of the application
    initialValues // Initial values
    http //axios instance used to make http requests
    message
    form
    setGlobalState
    */
    return undefined;

components.label: On Data Loaded

exposedVariables.name: data
exposedVariables.description: Fetched data from the server

exposedVariables.name: moment
exposedVariables.description: The moment.js object

exposedVariables.name: globalState
exposedVariables.description: The global state of the application

exposedVariables.name: http
exposedVariables.description: axios instance used to make http requests

exposedVariables.name: initialValues
exposedVariables.description: Initial values passsed to the form. In most cases, it's the selected row in a case where an action column is the one triggering the form displaying on the dialog

exposedVariables.name: message
exposedVariables.description: This is the Ant API for displaying toast messages. See: https://ant.design/components/message/#header

exposedVariables.name: form
exposedVariables.description: The form instance

exposedVariables.name: setGlobalState
exposedVariables.description: Setting the global state of the application

components.description: This action will be executed immediately after the data has been loaded (Fetched from the API)

availableConstants._code:
/*
    data
    moment // The moment.js object
    globalState // The global state of the application
    initialValues // Initial values
    http //axios instance used to make http requests
    message
    form
    setGlobalState
    */
    return undefined;

exposedVariables.name: data
exposedVariables.description: The form data

exposedVariables.name: moment
exposedVariables.description: The moment.js object

exposedVariables.name: parentFormValues
exposedVariables.description: Parent form values. The values of the form rendering the dialog.

exposedVariables.description: The global state of the application

exposedVariables.description: Initial values

exposedVariables.name: http
exposedVariables.description: axios instance used to make http requests

exposedVariables.name: message
exposedVariables.description: This is the Ant API for displaying toast messages. See: https://ant.design/components/message/#header

exposedVariables.name: setFormData
exposedVariables.description: A function used to update the form data

exposedVariables.name: setGlobalState
exposedVariables.description: Setting the global state of the application

components.description: This action will be executed whenever the form updates

availableConstants._code:
/*
    data
    moment // The moment.js object
    parentFormValues
    globalState // The global state of the application
    initialValues // Initial values
    http //axios instance used to make http requests
    message
    setFormData
    setGlobalState
    */
    return undefined;
